Topic.Title: Game session expires in seconds every time! {RESOLVED}

Posts.EditableText:
Online Quest editor/playing game : "Sorry your session has expired and your game has finished"

At worst: Happens as soon as game loads up! 
At best : Can only test/play game for less than a minute! 
This means testing game is virtually IMPOSSIBLE!
